thread.section_title: Blueinsurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blueinsurance | blueinsurance.ie
thread.title: Bronagh Cannon

author: Bronagh Cannon
title: Bronagh Cannon
text: I've only joined and have not had to make any claims on my travel insurance luckily enough, but the sales process was one of the best I've encountered. The staff are genuinely helpful and give lots of advice to make sure you are getting the best coverage. It's like talking to a human who actually cares rather than a corporate drone with no power to go off script. If this experience is any indicator of the rest of their service I'll be staying with Blue a long time.
